item.description:
Enjoy hits from the 70's till today's popular titles.

Get your dancing shoes on, come on out and
let's groove tonight!

Featuring "DJ PAUL"

Friendly people in a comfortable atmosphere from Central New England.
Admission $10.00 Dancers of all ages are welcome

Coffee & snacks will be provided Cash bar available

Contact: Ozzie Tuiskula 774-262-0075 DanceWorcester@aol.com

Visit: www.DanceWorcester.net

Details:
Admission is $10.00 Dressy Casual
Dancers of all ages are welcome

Coffee & snacks will be provided

Directions to Maironis Park:

From Mass. Pike: Get off exit 10 Auburn, follow signs to Route 290 East.

From Route 290 East: (from Auburn)Take exit 22, at end of ramp, take a LEFT, go about 1/10 mile to light, take a LEFT onto N. Quinsigamond Avenue proceed 1.9 miles to Maironis Park, will be on your right, set back from the road.


From Route 290 West (from Hudson/Marlboro): Take exit 22, at end of ramp take a RIGHT, go 1/10 mile to light, take a LEFT onto N. Quinsigamond Avenue proceed 1.9 miles to Maironis Park, will be on your right, set back from the road.

Contact: Ozzie Tuiskula 774-262-0075 DanceWorcester@aol.com

Visit: www.DanceWorcester.net (please check site for weather cancelations)
item.how_to_find_us: Meet up signs on the tables to your left as walking in (back corner)
item.name: Social Dance at Maironis Park
